scripts.build: npm run build:app && npm run build:cdk
scripts.deploy: npm run build:app && cd cdk && npm run deploy
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd app && npm install && cd ../cdk && npm install
scripts.test:local: cd app && npm run build && docker build -t local-lambda . && docker run -p 9000:8080 local-lambda
scripts.test:lambda:clean: docker compose down -v && docker compose up --build
